ingredients.ingredient: 2 pounds bacon, cut in half lengthwise
2 (3 ounce) packages thin breadsticks (such as AlessiÂ®)

cookingTips: Wrap bacon strips tightly around breadsticks in a spiral
Coat with brown sugar before baking for even caramelization
Place on parchment paper to prevent sticking
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide proper spiral wrapping and help achieve crispy bacon with candied coating.
